languages.text:
"Ох, хорошо бы, как вы сказали... но только чую я — нехорошее что-то грядет с {rt_mf|его|ее} прибытием. Слышал я, что нов{rt_mf|ый|ая} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}... подождите, вон же Мейв стоит! Она прислуживала Звездно{rt_mf|му|й} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|же}. Пусть сама расскажет. Эй, Мейв!"
{n}Небольшая толпа спешит к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Нехорошее что-то грядет. Слышал я, что нов{mf|ый|ая} Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}... подождите, вон же Мейв стоит! Она прислуживала Звездно{mf|му|й} Госпо{mf|дину|же}. Пусть сама расскажет. Эй, Мейв!"
{n}Троица подходит вам и, как стая стервятников, окружает со всех сторон.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Ох, хорошо бы, как вы сказали... но только чую я — нехорошее что-то грядет с {rt_mf|его|ее} прибытием. Слышал я, что нов{rt_mf|ый|ая} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}... подождите, вон же Мейв стоит! Она прислуживала Звездно{rt_mf|му|й} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|же}. Пусть сама расскажет. Эй, Мейв!"
{n}Небольшая толпа спешит к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I've heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}. Let her tell. Hey, Maive!"
{n}A small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

"Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I've heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}. Let her tell. Hey, Maive!"
{n}A small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

"Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!"
{n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

"Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!"
{n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

"Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

"Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，要是真能像你说的那样就好了……可我总有种感觉，我感觉有什么坏事要发生了。我亲耳听到那位来自上界的大人——嘿，等等，快看！那不是梅芙嘛！之前就是她在侍奉那位大人，有什么话她都可以告诉我们。嘿，梅芙！”{n}那三个人朝你跑了过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，要是真能像你说的那样就好了……可我总有种感觉，我感觉有什么坏事要发生了。我亲耳听到那位来自上界的大人——嘿，等等，快看！那不是梅芙嘛！之前就是她在侍奉那位大人，有什么话她都可以告诉我们。嘿，梅芙！”{n}那三个人朝你跑了过来。{/n}

languages.text: «Ay, ojalá fuese como dices... pero algo me dice que se avecinan problemas ahora que ha venido. He oído que {rt_mf|el nuevo Señor Celestial|la nueva Señora Celestial}... ¡mira, es Maive! Ha estado a su servicio personalmente, nos lo podrá contar todo. ¡Eh, Maive!». {n}El pequeño grupo corre hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ay, ojalá fuese como dices... pero algo me dice que se avecinan problemas ahora que ha venido. He oído que {rt_mf|el nuevo Señor Celestial|la nueva Señora Celestial}... ¡mira, es Maive! Ha estado a su servicio personalmente, nos lo podrá contar todo. ¡Eh, Maive!». {n}El pequeño grupo corre hacia ti.{/n}

languages.text: "Ah, keşke dediğin gibi olsaydı... Ama bir şeyler bana onun gelişiyle kötü şeylerin yaklaştığını söylüyor. Yeni Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin}... Aa, şu Maive değil mi? Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} yanındaydı. Bize her şeyi anlatabilir. Maive!" {n}Küçük kalabalık yanına koşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, keşke dediğin gibi olsaydı... Ama bir şeyler bana onun gelişiyle kötü şeylerin yaklaştığını söylüyor. Yeni Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin}... Aa, şu Maive değil mi? Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} yanındaydı. Bize her şeyi anlatabilir. Maive!" {n}Küçük kalabalık yanına koşturuyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「あぁ、お前が言ったようになればいいがな…だが、もっと悪いことに{rt_mf|君|姫}がここに来るっていうのを聞いたんだ。新しい天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が…待て、見ろ、あそこにいるのはメイヴじゃないか！彼女は、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}に仕えていた。彼女ならすべてを教えてくれるかもしれない。おーい、メイヴ！」{n}小さな群衆があなたに向かってくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、お前が言ったようになればいいがな…だが、もっと悪いことに{rt_mf|君|姫}がここに来るっていうのを聞いたんだ。新しい天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が…待て、見ろ、あそこにいるのはメイヴじゃないか！彼女は、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}に仕えていた。彼女ならすべてを教えてくれるかもしれない。おーい、メイヴ！」{n}小さな群衆があなたに向かってくる。{/n}

languages.text: « Oh, j'aimerais bien, mais... quelque chose me dit que les choses vont tourner au vinaigre maintenant qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} est là. Il paraît que {rt_mf|le nouveau|la nouvelle} {rt_mf|Seigneur|Seigneure} Céleste... Oh, regardez, voilà Maive ! Elle a servi {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste. Elle pourra nous en dire plus. Hé, Maive ! » {n}Le petit attroupement se précipite vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, j'aimerais bien, mais... quelque chose me dit que les choses vont tourner au vinaigre maintenant qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} est là. Il paraît que {rt_mf|le nouveau|la nouvelle} {rt_mf|Seigneur|Seigneure} Céleste... Oh, regardez, voilà Maive ! Elle a servi {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste. Elle pourra nous en dire plus. Hé, Maive ! » {n}Le petit attroupement se précipite vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: "Ach, ich wünschte, es wäre so ... Aber ich habe das Gefühl, dass etwas ganz Schlimmes geschieht, nun, da {rt_mf|er|sie} hier ist. Ich habe gehört, {rt_mf|der neue himmlische Herr|die neue himmlische Herrin} soll ... hey, seht mal, da drüben ist Maive! Sie hat {rt_mf|dem himmlischen Herrn|der himmlischen Herrin } selbst gedient. Sie kann uns gewiss einiges erzählen. Hey, Maive!" {n}Die kleine Gruppe eilt auf dich zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I wish it was like you said... but something tells me bad things are coming now that {rt_mf|he|she}'s here. I heard the new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}— Wait, look, that's Maive over there! She served the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} herself. She can tell us all about it. Hey, Maive!" {n}The small crowd rushes toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ach, ich wünschte, es wäre so ... Aber ich habe das Gefühl, dass etwas ganz Schlimmes geschieht, nun, da {rt_mf|er|sie} hier ist. Ich habe gehört, {rt_mf|der neue himmlische Herr|die neue himmlische Herrin} soll ... hey, seht mal, da drüben ist Maive! Sie hat {rt_mf|dem himmlischen Herrn|der himmlischen Herrin } selbst gedient. Sie kann uns gewiss einiges erzählen. Hey, Maive!" {n}Die kleine Gruppe eilt auf dich zu.{/n}
